trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters" /> namespace contains classes you can use to override the life-cycle stages of a mobile control to modify its default XHTML markup or behavior for new markup standards or for specific browsers and mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters" /> 命名空间包含可用于重写移动控件生命周期各阶段的类，以便针对新的标记标准或特定的浏览器和移动设备修改其默认 XHTML 标记或行为。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900">www.asp.net/mobile</see> Web site.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900">www.asp.net/mobile</see> 网站。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter> is inherited by all adapter classes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace, including <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlLabelAdapter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlSelectionListAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter> 中的所有适配器类的继承<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters>命名空间，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlLabelAdapter>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlSelectionListAdapter>。
